mapper.insert: insert into payment values(p_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{sNo}, #{productId}, default, #{payAmount}, #{payConfirmNum}, null)
mapper.select: select b.sCategory, b.sTitle, b.sImg, a.pNo, a.mid, a.sno, a.pdate, a.payamount , a.CONFIRMPURCHASE from payment a left outer join sales b on (a.sno = b.sno) where a.mid = #{mId}
mapper.update: update payment set confirmpurchase = #{confirmPurchase} where pNo = #{pNo}
